sentence: Under the once-in-a-decade redistricting process, Georgias Republican governor, Brian Kemp, signed into law a new map that transformed Ms. McBaths district to favor Republicans overwhelmingly.
title: Two Democratic Congresswomen, One Redrawn Georgia District
